article_title: Dear HBO, this is how the last episode of “Game of Thrones” should have ended
article_text:
Topics: alternate ending, Game of Thrones, prince oberyn, the mountain and the viper, tyrion lannister, Video, Entertainment News

One “Game of Thrones” fan has righted the serious and grave wrong that the hit show’s writers and producers committed in “The Mountain and the Viper,” which aired June 1st. At this point, fans of the fantasy epic know not to get too attached to any character, no matter how good — but seriously, does everyone we’re rooting for always have to die? Could you not allowed fans the simple pleasure of having secured Tyrion Lannister’s freedom? Here’s a supremely more satisfying ending of the battle between Prince Oberyn Martell and the Sir Gregor Clegane, aka the Mountain. Ozzy Man, you are a true son of Hollywood. HBO–take notes:
